title: Beyond Automation: An Evaluative and Resilient AI Systems for Sustainable I5.0 Manufacturing in the Second Half of AI — from Problem Definition to Human-Centric Decision Support (code and data)
description: Resilient factory AI dashboard integrating LLM reasoning, AutoML (H2O), evaluation feedback loops, and explainability. This deposit accompanies the manuscript and includes datasets and a Jupyter notebook dashboard with a save feature.
